name: The UARO Project [DEMO]
description:
The UARO Project is a 3D action platformer that is set on the moon. You play as an advanced robot tasked with sabotaging the operations of Good Machines Inc, a lunar mining giant. 

Details:

Move, jump and dash your way through various platforming puzzles.

Defend yourself against enemy robots with ranged and melee combat.

Upgrade tools by mining minerals and selling them for cash.

Explore the large mining site above and below ground. 

 

Known Issues:

The gun does not work at point blank range. 

There is a specific part where the game sometimes crashes. There is an autosave checkpoint before, so the save should not be affected too much. 

The camera collision is very unstable. In small areas it will freak-out and also phase through walls from time to time. 

The falling system on some areas conflicts with the ragdoll physics. If you get stuck, reload your last save. 

The combat/enemy spawn system and AI movement is constantly being tweaked and balanced.

The UI is a work in progress. I am currently working to add more settings and better descriptions. 

This is a demo of a game I have been working on for a couple of years. This is my first game, so any feedback is helpful.
